description: A Dashboard to monitor Synology NAS

targets.query: SELECT last("usersSSH") AS "SSH", last("usersHTTP") AS "HTTP", last("usersSFTP") AS "SFTP" FROM "snmp.SYNO" WHERE ("agent_host" = '192.168.86.149') AND $timeFilter

list.label: Syno:
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp.SYNO" WITH KEY = "agent_host"

list.label: Interface:
list.name: intf
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ifTable" WITH KEY = "ifDescr" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host/

list.label: Appname
list.name: appname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM syslog WITH KEY=appname

list.label: LogHostname
list.name: logHost
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM syslog WITH KEY=hostname

list.label: Severity
list.name: severity
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM syslog WITH KEY=severity

title: Synology DashBoard
